mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO challenge ( challengeId, title, description, thumbnail, rewardPoints, regDate, challengeType ) VALUES ( #{challengeId}, #{title}, #{description},
#{thumbnail, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NVL(#{rewardPoints},0), SYSDATE, #{challengeType} )
INSERT INTO dailyChallenge (challengeId, weekday) VALUES (#{challengeId}, NVL(#{weekday}, 0))

INSERT INTO specialChallenge ( challengeId, startDate, endDate, requireDays, status ) VALUES ( #{challengeId}, TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), NVL(#{requireDays}, 3), NVL(#{specialStatus}, 0) )
mapper.select: SELECT challengeId, TO_CHAR(startDate,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS startDate, TO_CHAR(endDate,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS endDate, requireDays, status AS specialStatus FROM specialChallenge WHERE challengeId = #{challengeId}

SELECT , d.weekday, TO_CHAR(s.startDate,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS startDate, TO_CHAR(s.endDate,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS endDate, s.requireDays, s.status AS specialStatus FROM challenge c LEFT JOIN dailyChallenge d ON d.challengeId = c.challengeId LEFT JOIN specialChallenge s ON s.challengeId = c.challengeId
ORDER BY c.challengeId DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY
mapper.update:
UPDATE challenge
title = #{title}, description = #{description},
thumbnail = #{thumbnail},
thumbnail = NULL,
rewardPoints = #{rewardPoints}, challengeType = #{challengeType},
WHERE challengeId = #{challengeId}

UPDATE specialChallenge SET startDate = TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), endDate = TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), requireDays = NVL(#{requireDays}, 3), status = NVL(#{specialStatus}, 0) WHERE challengeId = #{challengeId}
